title: Stoke Space raises $510 million
summary:
Stoke Space, a company developing a fully reusable launch vehicle, has raised $510 million to fund operations through its first launches, bringing its total capital raised to nearly $1 billion.
The post Stoke Space raises $510 million appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Stoke Space gives us another reason to take it very seriously
summary: With the new investments, Stoke has raised nearly $1 billion.

title: Blue Origin flies sixth crewed New Shepard flight of 2025
summary:
Blue Origin launched its sixth crewed New Shepard flight so far this year Oct. 8 as the company works to increase the vehicle’s flight rate.

title: Space Force sets up ‘working capital fund’ for commercial space services
summary:

title: AST SpaceMobile gains Verizon ally amid SpaceX’s direct-to-device push
summary:
AST SpaceMobile’s shares jumped more than 8% Oct. 8 after Verizon joined AT&T in signing a definitive agreement to use its planned space-based cellular network, easing investor concerns about SpaceX’s aggressive push into the fledgling D2D market.
The post AST SpaceMobile gains Verizon ally amid SpaceX’s direct-to-device push appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Dancing dust devils trace raging winds on Mars
Blue Origin transports New Glenn booster to launch site ahead of Mars-bound mission
summary: The booster named ‘Never Tell Me the Odds’ will support the launch of NASA’s EscaPADE mission, sending two washing machine-sized satellites on their way to Mars.
